name: Tesano Roundabout Market
description: A vibrant local market offering fresh produce, textiles, and traditional crafts. Open daily from 6am to 8pm.

name: Achimota Forest Reserve
description: One of the last remaining urban forests in Accra, perfect for nature walks and bird watching.

name: Tesano Business Hub
description: Modern office complex housing various businesses and startups in the Tesano area.

name: Kaneshie Market
description: One of Accra's largest markets, famous for its variety of goods and bustling atmosphere.

name: Tesano Sports Complex
description: Community sports facility with football fields, basketball courts, and fitness areas.

name: Mount Zion Restaurant
description: Popular local eatery serving authentic Ghanaian dishes in a family-friendly environment.

name: Tesano Community Library
description: Public library offering books, internet access, and educational programs for all ages.

name: Calvary Baptist Church
description: Historic church building dating back to 1935, known for its beautiful architecture.
